title: No. 5, Volume 1
description: Set in a multicultural future landscape, No. 5 is the latest installment in a complex geopolitical series from Viz Graphic Novels. The character No. 5 is one of a group of global security guardians who attempts to break off on his own. Taiyo Matsumotoâ€™s signature surreal style combines European line art with Japanese pace and storytelling.
author: Taiyo Matsumoto
